metadata.name: Make A Wish.
metadata.description:
a personal collection.
each piece from this collection encapsulates one significant moment from my life that has impacted me in a mentally, emotionally, and/or physical way.

this piece is dedicated to my grandpa, who passed away february of this year. he had a long battle with dementia and by the time of his passing, he did not know or remember who i was. he was one of the people in my life who always encouraged my art and wanted to see me grow as an artist. while he is no longer here to physically see me mint my first art piece, i can only hope he is watching me from above & cheering me on. i love you, grandpa.
